trans-unit.source: A trigger action that pauses a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to pause a Storyboard.

<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> dotyczy tylko <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> gdy będzie aktywny (po <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> uruchamiania).

trans-unit.source: To control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls that <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Do sterowania <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> musi odwoływać się <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> z <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> która steruje <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: Zobacz [porady: Użyj wyzwalacze zdarzeń do kontrolowania scenorysu po jego uruchomieniu](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) przykład.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered after it has been paused, it appears to resume and restart.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> akcji jest wyzwalane po została wstrzymana, wygląda na to, aby wznowić i uruchomić ponownie.

trans-unit.source: That's not what actually happens, however: the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action actually replaces itself with an unpaused version.
trans-unit.target: To nie faktycznie wpływ, jednak: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> akcji faktycznie zastępuje się przy użyciu wersji ze stanu wstrzymania.

trans-unit.source: Each time a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action is triggered, clock objects are created for its storyboard.
trans-unit.target: Zawsze <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> akcji zostanie wywołany, zegara obiekty są tworzone dla jego scenorysu.

trans-unit.source: These clocks are distributed to the properties they animate.
trans-unit.target: Zegary są dystrybuowane do ich animowania właściwości.

trans-unit.source: So, when a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is triggered again, it doesn't restart its clocks, it replaces them with new clocks.
trans-unit.target: Tak, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> jest wyzwalane ponownie, nie go ponownie uruchomić jego zegary, zastępuje je z nowej zegary.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard" /> class.
